thread.title_full: Go to Vegas and win it back!Travelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Go to Vegas and win it back!Travelandtourworld.com
text:
Go to Vegas and win it back!
WestJet today launched a new contest called “WestJet’s Vegas Win it Back” to give guests booking a WestJet flight or vacation package to Las Vegas the chance to win the value of their purchase back in WestJet dollars.
“WestJet flies to Las Vegas 80 times each week from nine Canadian cities,” said Marshall Wilmot, WestJet Senior Vice-President, Marketing and Digital. “Vegas is one of the most popular WestJet destinations with Canadians on a year-round basis because of its many casinos, shows, shopping, good weather, tours and other attractions. And now, with the chance to win your trip back, there’s never been a better time to go to Vegas with WestJet and WestJet Vacations.”
Guests who book a WestJet-operated flight or WestJet Vacations package on westjet.com from any Canadian airport to Las Vegas between September 2 and 28, 2015, for travel on or before December 15, 2015, can enter the contest via the website. A total of 28 winners will be awarded the full value of their reservation back in WestJet dollars, including taxes and fees, toward the purchase of a future WestJet flight or vacation package.
Source:- Westjet
